property.name: tickTime
property.description: The length of a single tick in milliseconds, which is the basic time unit used by ZooKeeper

property.name: initLimit
property.description: Ticks to allow for sync at Init.

property.name: syncLimit
property.description: Ticks to allow for sync at Runtime.

property.name: autopurge.snapRetainCount
property.description: ZooKeeper purge feature retains the autopurge. snapRetainCount most recent snapshots and the corresponding transaction logs in the dataDir and dataLogDir respectively and deletes the rest.

property.name: autopurge.purgeInterval
property.description: The time interval in hours for which the purge task has to be triggered. Set to a positive integer (1 and above) to enable the auto purging.

property.name: 4lw.commands.whitelist
property.description: A list of comma separated Four Letter Words commands that user wants to use. A valid Four Letter Words command must be put in this list else ZooKeeper server will not enable the command. By default the whitelist only contains "srvr" command which zkServer.sh uses. The rest of four letter word commands are disabled by default.

property.name: admin.enableServer
property.description: Set to "false" to disable the AdminServer. By default the AdminServer is enabled.

property.name: admin.serverPort
property.description: The port the embedded Jetty server listens on. Defaults to 8080.

property.name: metricsProvider.httpPort
property.description: ZooKeeper prometheus metrics provider http port.

property.name: content
property.description: The port the embedded Jetty server listens on. Defaults to 8080.
